id.title: ID
id.description: The component ID. Must be unique within all layouts/pages in a layout-set. Cannot end with <dash><number>.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

pageBreak.title: Page break
pageBreak.description: Optionally insert page-break before/after component when rendered in PDF

breakBefore.title: Page break before
breakBefore.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added before the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

breakAfter.title: Page break after
breakAfter.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added after the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

readOnly.title: Read only/disabled?
readOnly.description:
Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be read only/disabled. Defaults to false.
Please note that even with read-only fields in components, it may currently be possible to update the field by modifying the request sent to the API or through a direct API call.

required.title: Required?
required.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be required. Defaults to false.

showValidations.title: Validation types
showValidations.description: List of validation types to show

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

optionsId.title: Dynamic options (fetched from server)
optionsId.description: ID of the option list to fetch from the server

mapping.title: Mapping
mapping.description: A mapping of key-value pairs (usually used for mapping a path in the data model to a query string parameter).

queryParameters.title: Query parameters
queryParameters.description: A mapping of query string parameters to values. Will be appended to the URL when fetching options.

secure.title: Secure options (when using optionsId)
secure.description: Whether to call the secure API endpoint when fetching options from the server (allows for user/instance-specific options)

sortOrder.description: Sorts the code list in either ascending or descending order by label.

source.title: Option source
source.description: Allows for fetching options from the data model, pointing to a repeating group structure

group.title: Group
group.description: The repeating group to base options on.

label.title: Label
label.description: A label of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

value.title: Value
value.description: Field in the group that should be used as value

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

helpText.title: Help Text
helpText.description: A help text for the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

preselectedOptionIndex.title: Preselected option index
preselectedOptionIndex.description: Index of the option to preselect (if no option has been selected yet)

help.title: Help
help.description: Help text of the Likert component/row

tableTitle.title: Table title
tableTitle.description: Title used in the table view (overrides the default title)

shortName.title: Short name (for validation)
shortName.description: Alternative name used for required validation messages (overrides the default title)

requiredValidation.title: Required validation message
requiredValidation.description: Full validation message shown when the component is required and no value has been entered (overrides both the default and shortName)

summaryTitle.title: Summary title
summaryTitle.description: Title used in the summary view (overrides the default title)

summaryAccessibleTitle.title: Accessible summary title
summaryAccessibleTitle.description: Title used for aria-label on the edit button in the summary view (overrides the default and summary title)

dataModelBindings.title: Data model binding
dataModelBindings.description: Describes the location in the data model where the component should store its value(s). A simple binding is used for components that only store a single value, usually a string.

metadata.description: Describes the location where metadata for the option based component should be stored in the datamodel.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Define the layout style for the options
